subsection_analysis.refined_text: o Prepare each side dish separately. o Serve as accompaniment to the main meal . add beef, fish, salt, pepper, and water, simmer until meat is tender .
o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter . Serve with breadsticks . assorted cured meats (salami, prosciutto) o cheeses (mozzarella, provolone)
o Mix ground pork, chopped shrimp, diced mushrooms, chopped carrots . julienned carrots, chopped pork .
shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, and salsa for toppings . toppings include shredded cheddar, salsa, lettuce and shredded tomatoes .
shredded cabbage, diced tomatoes, sliced avocado, and lime wedges for toppings . chopped avocado, chopped tomatoes, and shredded cabbage .
